data.meanings: Negative particle giving to the present the sense of the perfect; not.
data.sentence: The word لَمْ comes from the root ل م and is associated with the meanings: Negative particle giving to the present the sense of the perfect; not.

data.meanings: Proposition which points to cause, space or time. In, into, amongst, in company with, during, with, of, for, for the sake of, upon, concerning, after, in comparison, about, among, on account of, respecting, by the side of, on, by, against, according to, in respect of.
data.sentence: The word فِي comes from the root ف ي and is associated with the meanings: Proposition which points to cause, space or time. In, into, amongst, in company with, during, with, of, for, for the sake of, upon, concerning, after, in comparison, about, among, on account of, respecting, by the side of, on, by, against, according to, in respect of.

data.meanings: chastisement, castigate, punishment, torture, torment, retribution, abstain/desist, relinquish, quit.adhb - sweet (usually water), e.g. 25:53, 35:12.
data.sentence: The word بِعَذَابٍ comes from the root ع ذ ب and is associated with the meanings: chastisement, castigate, punishment, torture, torment, retribution, abstain/desist, relinquish, quit.adhb - sweet (usually water), e.g. 25:53, 35:12.
The word أَلِيمٍ comes from the root ا ل م and is associated with the meanings: ALM

data.meanings: To follow, walk behind, imitate, pursue, consecutive. To read, recite, peruse, rehearse, declare, meditate.Sought repeatedly, collect.Bond or obligation.One who relieves or aids another in singing.
data.sentence: The word تُتْلَى comes from the root ت ل و and is associated with the meanings: To follow, walk behind, imitate, pursue, consecutive. To read, recite, peruse, rehearse, declare, meditate.Sought repeatedly, collect.Bond or obligation.One who relieves or aids another in singing.

data.meanings: to be heavy (in ear), deaf, heaviness in the ear, be gentle, gracious, respected.
data.sentence: The word وَقْرًا comes from the root و ق ر and is associated with the meanings: to be heavy (in ear), deaf, heaviness in the ear, be gentle, gracious, respected.

data.meanings: to be close, near, follow, be up to.tawalla (prf. 3rd. m. sing.) - turneth away.tawallau (prf. 3rd. m. pl.) - they turned away.tawallaitum (prf. 2nd. m. pl.) - ye turned away.yatawalla (impf. 3rd. m. pl.) - he turns away.
data.sentence: The word وَلَّى comes from the root و ل ي and is associated with the meanings: to be close, near, follow, be up to.tawalla (prf. 3rd. m. sing.) - turneth away.tawallau (prf. 3rd. m. pl.) - they turned away.tawallaitum (prf. 2nd. m. pl.) - ye turned away.yatawalla (impf. 3rd. m. pl.) - he turns away.

data.meanings: To be hard, become hard, be grievous, grow up, be great. Kabira/Yakburu: To be exceed anyone in age, become stout and tall, grow big, become great, illustrious, become momentous (affair).
data.sentence: The word مُسْتَكْبِرًا comes from the root ك ب ر and is associated with the meanings: To be hard, become hard, be grievous, grow up, be great. Kabira/Yakburu: To be exceed anyone in age, become stout and tall, grow big, become great, illustrious, become momentous (affair).
The word يَسْمَعْهَا comes from the root س م ع and is associated with the meanings: to hear, hearken, listen.

data.meanings: he gave ear or listened to it, being pleased, grant leave, to allow, permit/ordered, be informed, advised, notification/announcement/proclamation, ear, appetite/longing/yearning.
data.sentence: The word أُذُنَيْهِ comes from the root ا ذ ن and is associated with the meanings: he gave ear or listened to it, being pleased, grant leave, to allow, permit/ordered, be informed, advised, notification/announcement/proclamation, ear, appetite/longing/yearning.

data.meanings: Skin/Pare/Strip/Skin Contact/Epidermis (or insides)Complexion/Hue->Delicacy, fineness ofBeauty/Elegance of form/Bright cheerful countenanceRejoiced/Rejoicing/Good, good tidings, glad tidings/Announcements (bearer of), proclaiming, commencement, beginnings of anything/Indications/Streaks (daylight breaking, wind over land)Conducting, managing affairs personally.Lie with, to go in unto.Mankind, Human beings, Lowest/basest/meanest sort of people, Perfect man (combining gentleness with strength).
